original_text:
For all the gods of the peoples are worthless idols,
    but the Lord made the heavens.
korean_text: 만국의 모든 신은 헛것이나 여호와께서는 하늘을 지으셨도다

sentences.original_text: For all the gods of the peoples are worthless idols
sentences.korean_translation: 대저 모든 민족의 신들은 헛된 우상이라.

sentences.original_text: but the Lord made the heavens
